website_summaries.verdict: Teva constructed the lightweight Terra Fi 4 as a hiking sandal that can overcome challenges in and out of the water. Its supportive yet comfortable assembly did not fail to amaze consumers. The Shoc Pad technology surely performed as expected, too. However, others were disgruntled with the latest upgrade as they felt that the previous versions were much more efficient. All things considered, the Teva Terra Fi 4 is a hiking sandal still worth giving a shot bearing in mind its accomplishments in different aspects.
pros: This multi-sport sandal was very comfortable, as testified by the majority
Several users admired the fit of the Terra Fi 4
They noted that it fits them perfectly
The overall support was liked by a lot of wearers
A significant number of Terra Fi 4 purchasers mentioned that it could be worn as their daily footgear
The sandals were able to perform well in and overcome wet conditions, based on a couple of consumer reviews
Its sturdiness won the hearts of many
Numerous Teva stalwarts appreciated the arch support they got from the pair
A high percentage of wearers liked how cushy the sandal was
They approved of the Shoc Pad technology
The traction of Teva’s Terra Fi 4 was undeniable, as observed by quite a number of users
Experts didn’t dally in calling this sandal phenomenally lightweight
cons: The previous Terra Fi version was a lot better, according to a handful of brand enthusiasts
They fretted over Teva trying to fix something that was never broken—hence the downgraded quality
A professional gear blogger found his foot slipping against the sandal’s footbed after wading through shallow waters

customer_reviews.title: Quality control lacking
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair similar to these that lasted 10 years. Unfortunately the strap on the back of the left sandal I bought recently here (Amazon) has come un stitched after a week just by me merely adjusting the velcro strap. Poor workmanship perhaps 'seconds' If you're not in a hurry for an upcoming holiday/trip then they're worth buying and sending back if u have issues but I just do not have the time to wait for returns process so will glue and hope for the best. Not the standard for Teva i had come to love. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Faulty sandals!
customer_reviews.text: The fit was fine, but the sandal itself was faulty. The one side strap was not attached to the front eyelet. Upon investigating further the stitching could be seen, but was not attached to its mating part. As we were going on holiday in a couple of days, the option on returning these sandals was not viable due to the replacement timescale and we reluctantly accepted the sandals and repaired them ourselves. A review of the quality control needs to be urgently looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Eun

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect multi-purpose foot ware...highly recomended
customer_reviews.text: There are just a few things in life that are perfect and these top of the range Teva's are just that. I am on my 3rd pair in about 12 years. Hike in them in the mountains, walk with them in the rivers and use them every day as the most comfy foot ware on earth. Only one slight niggle is this latest version is a bit heavier than my previous pair. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: N. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Teva sandals
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these revamp sandals. I live and die in sandals nine months of the year. My last three pairs of sandals have been merrels which were very good but the last two pairs weren’t as comfortable. My wife had a pair of tevas and she convinced me to try a pair. Fantastic comfortable supportive with good grip. I have been on 5 good walks on the cliff tops and woodlands and have nothing but praise. Only wish I had chosen a different colour.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dumbell

customer_reviews.title: 4WD sandals
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Teva's for much of 20 years. They are hard wearing all terrain sandals with excellent grip and presentable when you come out of the wilderness into the pub. Sturdy adjustable velcro straps. The inner sole on my previous pair was solid rubber. This new version has a more spongy feel, let's hope that it is closed cell and won't suck moisture in... Too cold to wear outside at the moment!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Townsend

customer_reviews.title: TEVA-Comfortable straight out of box
customer_reviews.text: These are very well constructed sandals eith neat stitched webbing for foot straps. The comfort from day 1 is surprislying soft and sponge like. They look great too. I must admit best sandals i have come across for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: tbear64

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grip, wet or dry
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly with regular email updates(to be delivered today, next few hours & done). Well packaged and not excessive. Product as described: I am replacing my old pair after 3 years heavy usage. I use them to hike, holiday, rockpool and as general wear. Excellent grip, wet or dry, deep padding to the sole, all the strap adjustment I've ever needed (I do use them all).
customer_reviews.author: CasioB

customer_reviews.title: Downhill: from sporting to posing
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! I have been a walking advert for Teva F 1.4 for years and worn out 2 pairs on the Welsh and Scottish hills. This latest pair is not sport quality its just a fashion item for a garden party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard wearing and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Teva sandals in the past and have always found them to be hard wearing and good quality. These are no exception and I would recommend them to anyone wanting hard wearing sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - second time around
customer_reviews.text: I originally chose size 6.5 UK but size 7 UK arrived - too big. So returned and ordered 6 and they fit fine (I have size 6.5 UK feet) - Great quality as always from Teva - bought these as a replacement for my 10 year old Tevas which are fine except that the soles wore out. These sandals are brilliant - rugged, good looking and really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jakeuk

customer_reviews.title: ... had several generations of Teva sandals and they never disappoint. This pair were worn every day throughout a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have now had several generations of Teva sandals and they never disappoint. This pair were worn every day throughout a travelling trip to India and are still now going strong. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: superb allround footwear.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought these, the last pair lasted some 12 years performed beyond my expectation, thankfully the design has change little so these should be goo for another 12 years. Cant recommend them highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Couchman

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials, very comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Best fit sandles I have ever worn (65 Yrs Old). Very well made, quality materials. Chose your time on price and go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian. (Uk).

customer_reviews.title: So comfy straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals straight out of the box. So comfortable. Walking for 8 hours a day around Mexico city was no problem. Good grip and easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good as ever.
customer_reviews.text: I've beed a Teva fan for nearly 20 years having first discovered them on vacation on Sanibel Island Fl. These fit my size 11s perfectly & are extrememly comfortable, at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the left one, I also like the right one. I use them as sandals.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Sandals for long walks
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Teva's - the first pair lasted for years. Comfortable to wear straight away and ideal for walking long distances.

customer_reviews.title: Walk to keep fit
customer_reviews.text: The usual high standards from Skechers, they rubbed a bit but that was my fault not breaking them in

customer_reviews.title: Teva Terra
customer_reviews.text: Have bought Teva before and these do not disappoint. Comfy from coming out of the box straight onto the foot. Velcro straps are secure. The sole is cushioned and comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandals for the active walker

customer_reviews.text: Excellent all-terrain sandals replacing old pair of Tevas, which have lasted 10+ years. Very comfortable on the first wear and since.

customer_reviews.title: but great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but great quality and fit. Quick delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Fashionable and functional. This is a solid sandal thats versatile for the beach or walking around a steep town.

customer_reviews.title: This model has a different configuration to my existing pair ...
customer_reviews.text: This model has a different configuration to my existing pair, and was too tight on my little toe - an area I can have problems with if the fit is too tight. Wrong model for me!

customer_reviews.title: Teva FI 4 Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Teva Sandals are stylish & very comfortable & can be used on any surface

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Can walk all day in these carrying a light pack.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, very easy on the feet
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, very easy on the feet. I haven't gone any long distance so far but I'm sure they will do the job they are designed for. Recommended to anyone who is looking for this sort of footwear.

customer_reviews.title: 👍 👍
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Have bought them previously and am well satisfied

customer_reviews.title: walking sandals
customer_reviews.text: They are just what I expected, having had Teva sandals before. Thick sole which gives a nicely cushioned walk, ideal for my knackered knees.

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Generous fit with a trekking sole. My last pair lasted me ages.

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: brilliant - as expected - price and despatch all good - very pleased and would recommend

customer_reviews.text: These are replacing my old, worn out pair. They look the part but I have yet to put them to the test.

customer_reviews.title: A comfy and well made sandal!
customer_reviews.text: It is well made with great traction and for the foot at the footbed and for the rubber sole. A little bit heavy but thats caused the thick sole wich is very comfortable. I am very satisfied except one thing, I would like a little bit more arch support

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These served me well on the Abel Tasman Coastal Track in New Zealand.

customer_reviews.text: I found them a little heavier and tougher than my old ones. I supose I'll get used to them in few days. They look great.

customer_reviews.title: teva sandals.highly recommended

customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to walk in and the sole is wide enough to stop your feet sliding off

customer_reviews.text: quality saddles that will handle strolling up the beach or walking across a rugged terrain.

customer_reviews.text: Just what I was expecting and fulfilled what required for my holiday walks

customer_reviews.title: Love is in the air
customer_reviews.text: Love the Teva's. IF you want real Teva's get the Terra Fi 4 as they seem to be the last of the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: tom corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ideal replacement for my last pair that were 13 years old. Let's hope they last that long.
customer_reviews.author: stephen brown

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was excellent. The delievery, the Sandal was perfect. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Esbjörn öberg

customer_reviews.title: Tip: order large and you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My experience of trekking sandals is that I need one size bigger than normal so I don't catch my toes on rocks, brambles etc. That's what I ordered and that's what I got, same as on my last pair of Teva which lasted many years. UPDATE June 2016 After wearing the sandals for just a couple of weeks, the neoprene padding on the ankle strap has torn and broken. It's actually a design fault as the plastic strap holder cuts into the neoprene. I now see other purchasers have had several replacements. However, the Amazon returns system sends me round in circles as this is now several months 'old', and there is no contacting the seller Millet Sports. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Gramail

customer_reviews.title: the sandal belong to my favourite equipment, the lately purchased pair already shows signs ...
customer_reviews.text: the sandal belong to my favourite equipment, the lately purchased pair already shows signs of "programmed ageing", the changed pattern on sole will probably wear down more quickly, as it has been with the my previous sandals -- the name of the omnipresent game is controlled obsolescence.
customer_reviews.author: Ladislav

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable sandal's I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable sandal's I've ever purchased. I was so impressed I purchased a pair for my partner.

customer_reviews.title: excellent shoes but to large
customer_reviews.text: These were a very large 40.5 but otherwise the shoes would have been what I wanted. I did return them.

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: The Tevas are excellent. The service was superb. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I was looking for, they fit well and are comfortable from the first walk.

customer_reviews.title: Tevas
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. Sandals arrived in good condition, well packed. They fit well and are very comfortable to use at the Leisure centre. Very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Grate
customer_reviews.text: Very good with the service and the product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: A A Mackintosh

product_meta.title: Teva Mens Terra Fi 4-M Terra Fi 4-m
product_meta.description: A three-point strap adjustment and open toe box enable the wearer to slide into the Teva Terra FI 4 Walking Sandals with considerable ease; the aforementioned open toe element also prevents water from pooling toward the front of the sandal should it become exposed to wetter terrain. A nylon shank keeps the foot stable and well supported, whilst a rugged, Spider Original Rubber outsole yields a tremendous amount of grip, even in wetter environments. The sandal has been finished with a Microban zinc-based anti-microbial treatment that inhibits the spread of odour carrying bacteria.
feature_bullets: Ideal trail sandals for all sorts of surfaces, versatile and the quality you expect from Teva
Multiple points of adjustment allow for an ideal fit
A soft shoc pad in the heel gives you serious shock absorption; Microban zinc-based anti-microbial treatment
Teva spider original rubber is made to grip in wet environments
A nylon shank keeps the foot stable and in contro
Activities: Travel, mountain trails, river crossings
